name: Fuerza Mágica Intergaláctica (Miguel Anzola)
description:
This is a Latin American Spanish localization of Intergalactic Wizard Force - LocJAM Edition, made by Miguel Anzola, aka ePath.

Sit tight, get your anatomy glossary, and enjoy yer "Space Chicken"!

It's my first ever LocJAM submission. Huge thanks to Powerhoof and Alain Dellepiane for making this event possible.

Have fun!
